function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Densification of communities leading to higher population density","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread in cities","Mitigation":"Implementing effective strategies for behavior modification and public health measures to reduce disease transmission","Technologies":"Urban planning and design strategies for better spacing and ventilation, communication technologies for public health messaging","People":"Inhabitants of densified communities","Owner":"Urban planners, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Obesity and old age correlated with greater COVID-19 mortality risk","Impact":"Higher mortality rates and severity of COVID-19 in obese and elderly individuals","Mitigation":"Promoting healthier lifestyles, providing better healthcare access for high-risk groups, and addressing equity and social justice issues related to health","Technologies":"Health education and promotion technologies, healthcare access and affordability solutions","People":"Obese and elderly individuals at higher risk, marginalized communities","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, policymakers, community leaders"},{"Description":"Increased obesity rates in the United States and globally","Impact":"Higher prevalence of obesity leading to increased vulnerability to COVID-19 and other health risks","Mitigation":"Promoting healthy eating, physical activity, and addressing socioeconomic factors contributing to obesity","Technologies":"Health and nutrition education, fitness technologies, economic and social policy interventions","People":"Populations at risk of obesity, including children and adults","Owner":"Public health authorities, educational institutions, policymakers"}]}
